gwt.g2d.client.graphics
Class RadialGradient

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g2d.client.graphics.Gradient
      gwt.g2d.client.graphics.RadialGradient

public class RadialGradient
extends Gradient

Represents a radial gradient that paints along the cone given by the circles.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

Constructor Summary
RadialGradient(Circle circle0, Circle circle1)
          Creates a radial gradient from circle0 to circle1.
RadialGradient(double x0, double y0, double radius0, double x1, double y1, double radius1)
          Creates a radial gradient from the circle (x0, y0, radius0) to the circle (x1, y1, radius1).
RadialGradient(Vector2 position0, double radius0, Vector2 position1, double radius1)
          Creates a radial gradient from position0 with radius radius0 to position1 with radius radius1.
